title: Bug 115960 - Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: Datetime values retrieved from the table are displayed differently in dynamic text items compared to data/text items.
EB: When inputting 'new Date()' as the content for three items and saving and previewing, the expected result is that all three items show the same format. However, the actual result is that the data and text item show the same format, but the dynamic text item shows a different format.
SR: To reproduce the issue, please follow these steps: 1. Insert a text, data, and dynamic text item. 2. Specify 'new Date()' as the content for each item. 3. Save and preview the items to observe the discrepancy in the datetime format between the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
